DOC.brief_summary: We randomized patients who received laparoscopic surgery for benign gynecologic disease into double dose (Experimental Group) or single dose (Control Group) of antiemetics. We compared the degree of postoperative nausea and vomiting in experimental and control groups.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Antiemetics to Reduce Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopy for benign gynecologic disease Vomiting within 24 hours before surgery Not using patient controlled analgesics postoperatively
